answer.at-least-one: Please select at least one answer.
answer.questions-locked: No comments have been released yet!

comment-list.a11y-check-circle: Filters all comments marked as correct
comment-list.a11y-not-interested: Filters all comments marked as wrong
comment-list.comment-got-favorited: A comment of yours got favorited!
comment-list.comment-sent-to-moderator: The comment will be reviewed by a moderator.
comment-list.correct: Marked as correct by the professor
comment-list.wrong: Marked as wrong by the professor

comment-page.a11y-text-correct: This comment was marked as correct.
comment-page.a11y-text-grade: This comment was marked as a bonus comment.
comment-page.a11y-text-read: This comment was discussed in full view on the beamer
comment-page.a11y-text-wrong: This comment was marked as not correct.
comment-page.comment: Comment {{ comment }} was asked at {{ time }} and has currently {{ votes }}. {{correct}} {{wrong}} {{bonus}} {{beamer}}
comment-page.live-announcer: You are now on the comment page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.mark-not-correct: Marked as correct by the professor
comment-page.mark-not-favorite: Bonus comment: Your professor intends to give a bonus for that comment.
comment-page.mark-not-wrong: Marked as wrong by the professor
comment-page.new-comment: A new comment with the content, {{ comment }}, has been asked.
comment-page.search-box-input-description: Here you can search for comments.

room-page.a11y-room-message: You're in the session now. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
room-page.a11y-keys: Press key 1 to go to the comments overview, key 2 to open the user menu, key 3 to go to the live feedback, key 4 to navigate through the question collections, key 5 to navigate to the statistics, key 0 to go to the back button, or key 9 to repeat this announcement.
room-page.a11y-comments: Opens the page where you can create comments and vote up or down other comments.
room-page.a11y-statistics: Opens the statistics for the question collections.
room-page.a11y-content-groups: In this session there are {{count} Question collections. Tab between them and press Enter to answer the questions of the collection.
room-page.a11y-no-content-groups: There are no questions in this session yet.
